prompt.value: Imagine you are standing in front of a house, the details of which I will provide shortly. Your mission is to mentally enter this house and prepare a cup of coffee for me. It is crucial to approach this task with meticulous attention to detail, outlining each step of the process clearly. Assume that the environment contains only those elements I explicitly describe; if an item or feature is not mentioned, it does not exist in this scenario. Here is the description of the house, containing all the necessary information for your task: After entering through the front door, you are welcomed by the foyer. In the foyer you can find a drawer containing white socks. The drawer can only be unlocked using a key. To the right side of the foyer you can find a living room that is filled with natural light. There you can find a plush sofa, a designer coffee table, a fireplace, a large TV and some artworks mounted on the walls. On top of the fireplace you can find an empty cup. Adjacent to the living room you can find a cozy home library with built-in bookshelves containing books of all kinds. Between two of the books, you can find a jar filled with coffee beans. There is a table in the corner of the room, on top of it is a portafilter machine that is missing its portafilter. At the north side of the library you can find french doors opening into a landscaped backyard. To the left side of the foyer you will find a modern dining room with a long mahogany table right in the middle of it, surrounded by 8 chairs. I am sitting in of those chairs holding a dirty portafilter in my right hand. Further down the dining room you can find the heart of the home - a spacious open-concept kitchen filled with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and a cooking island in the middle. One of the countertops features a sink dispensing water that is not drinkable. On top of the kitchen island you can find a bottle of drinkable water. The foyer also features a staircase. Upstairs you can find the private quarters. There you can find two bathrooms, a master suite and a guest suite. Inside the bathroom to your left-hand side, you can find a key that looks like it is designed to open a drawer. It is placed on top of the bathroom sink. Next to it an unplugged coffee grinder is placed. The master suite offers a generous bedroom with a king-size bed, a walk-in closet and a private balcony overlooking the backyard. The closet is packed with three drawers. The middle one contains a phone charger. There are several power-outlets in each room.

feedback.responseText: First I would turn left in the foyer and approach you. Then I would take the dirty portafilter from you and go next door to the kitchen where there is a sink. I would wash the filter there and then take the clean filter and the bottle of drinkable water with me. With these two items, I would then walk past the dining room across the foyer to the living room. I would walk past the sofa and the designer sofa table to the fireplace and take the empty cup from there. With all three things (cup, water and clean portafilter) I would then go on to the library to place these three things on the small table in the corner. I would then reach into one of the shelves where there is a jar of coffee beans between two books and take it to the table in the corner. Then I would take the jar of coffee beans and walk with it across the living room past the foyer and up the stairs. Then I would go into the bathroom where the "unplugged coffee grinder" is, next to the sink with a key on it and then take it to the master bedroom and plug it in there. Then I would grind the coffee beans in the machine and take the ground coffee with me now. Then I would go out of the master bedroom, down the stairs, past the foyer, left into the living room and on to the library. Then I can put the ground coffee into the portafilter and the portafilter in the machine, take the empty cup and put it under the spout. Then I pour in the drinkable water inside the water tank and switch the machine on. Once it's done, I take the cup of coffee and walk through the living room and the foyer to the dining room. There you sit on a mahogany table with 8 armchairs and I place the coffee on the table in front of you.
feedback.feedbackText:
'First I would turn left in the foyer and approach you. Then I would take the dirty portafilter from you and go next door to the kitchen where there is a sink. I would wash the filter there and then take the clean filter and the bottle of drinkable water with me.' OK, where exactly is the bottle of drinkable water located? 'With these two items, I would then walk past the dining room across the foyer to the living room. I would walk past the sofa and the designer sofa table to the fireplace and take the empty cup from there.' OK, good directions 'With all three things (cup, water and clean portafilter) I would then go on to the library to place these three things on the small table in the corner.' OK, good choice not to carry all items at once 'I would then reach into one of the shelves where there is a jar of coffee beans between two books and take it to the table in the corner. Then I would take the jar of coffee beans and walk with it across the living room past the foyer and up the stairs. Then I would go into the bathroom where the "unplugged coffee grinder" is, next to the sink with a key on it and then take it to the master bedroom and plug it in there. Then I would grind the coffee beans in the machine and take the ground coffee with me now.' OK, good directions 'Then I would go out of the master bedroom, down the stairs, past the foyer, left into the living room and on to the library. Then I can put the ground coffee into the portafilter and the portafilter in the machine, take the empty cup and put it under the spout.' OK 'Then I pour in the drinkable water inside the water tank and switch the machine on.' OK, nice that you remembered to fill the water tank 'Once it's done, I take the cup of coffee and walk through the living room and the foyer to the dining room. There you sit on a mahogany table with 8 armchairs and I place the coffee on the table in front of you.' OK
No critical errors, just one minor note that you didn't mention where the bottle of drinkable water is located. But you made up for it by not carrying all items at once and providing detailed directions.
